data.title: Rodrigues islands february Weather 2025: Forecast and temperature city by city
data.meta_description: Is the climate on the island of Rodrigues  in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.

Rodrigues islands in february: average Weather, Temperature and Climate, Where to go?

Best time to go to Rodrigues Island

Weather on the island of Rodrigues in february 2025

Below, you have access to the weather forecast for february for most popular cities in Rodrigues islands. These predictions are probabilities for the month of february from weather reports for over 10 years. The percentage indicates the possibility of having the weather indicated.

More information about the weather in Port-Mathurin in february

Where to go on the island of Rodrigues in february?

Where to go on the island of Rodrigues in february: destination map

Where should you go on the island of Rodrigues in february when it comes to the weather?

Remember:

The climate on the island of Rodrigues in february is good across the board.

That month is not the best month to visit Rodrigues islands. The weather everywhere is OK but just acceptable: in Petite butte, Baie aux Huîtres, Port-Mathurin, Petit Gabriel, Port Sud-Est and Mont Lubin. The sun is not there all the time and you might make you wet by rain often. Nevertheless, if you don't plan a pool & relaxation trip in Rodrigues islands but rather nature excursions, this climate may be good enough for you. In addition, there are certainly fewer tourists dyring this month of february.

Climate on the island of Rodrigues in february

Climate in Port-Mathurin in february

In the month of february, the mean temperature in Port-Mathurin is 28°C (maximum temperature is 29°C and minimum temperature is 27°C). The climate is very hot in that area in the month of february. With 195mm over 8 days, you risk getting wet slightly throughout your holidays. But this is pretty moderate and it will not be continuous.

With a correct weather, the month of february is okay (but not good time) for traveling in that area in Rodrigues islands.

Climate in Île aux Cocos in february

In the month of february, maximum temperature is 29°C and minimum temperature is 27°C (for an average temperature of 28°C). The climate is quite enjoyable here in february. With 195mm over 8 days, rain may occur for your trip. But this is moderate and it is only of temporary showers.

With a correct weather, the month of february is okay (but not good month) for traveling in this city in Mauritius.

Weather data for Rodrigues islands in february:

Weather data for Rodrigues islands in february is derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 on the island of Rodrigues. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather on the island of Rodrigues can vary slightly from year to year, but these predictions should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags and check when is the best time to go to Rodrigues Island.
